OAuth2 Component
================

OAuth2 client implementation for `socialconnect/auth` project.

# Built In Providers

Library has built in support for the following providers:

* Amazon
* Facebook
* Vk (ВКонтакте)
* Instagram
* Google
* GitHub
* GitLab
* Slack
* BitBucket
* Twitch
* Vimeo
* DigitalOcean
* Yandex
* MailRu
* Odnoklassniki
